title: God of War Comes to PC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.20.21
description:
Janet and Tim get into huge game releases and ambitious plans from God of War 2018 coming to PC, Cyberpunk and Witcher 3's Next Gen Release, and Grasshopper's Next 10 Years.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Gamescast is up and it features head of Xbox Game Studios Matt Booty
In case you missed it, the 2nd episode of The Arkham Files is already live over on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames and it’s all about why Batman: Arkham City is the best at making you truly feel like Batman. The next episode of The Arkham Files premieres this coming Monday, October 25th, and it’s all about why Batman: Arkham Origins was left behind and forgotten AND why it’s better than you remember.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:05:20 - God of War on PC - PlayStation Blog
00:22:45 - Next Gen Cyberpunk 2077 and The Witcher 3 are on their way - CDPR on Twitter
00:32:00 - Suda says Grasshopper’s ‘ten-year plan’ includes 3 original IPs, maybe some reboots - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:39:00 - Ad
00:41:05 - Xbox Game Pass Subscriber Growth Slowed Down This Year - Matt Kim at IGN
00:48:15 - New video reveals Starfield's Settled Systems - Ed Nightengale at Eurogamer
00:51:18 - Epic Games Announces Publishing Partnerships with EYES OUT and Spry Fox - Epic Games Official Website
00:57:00 - Out today
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam and Tim for TimTam Thursdays

Janet and Tim get into huge game releases and ambitious plans from God of War 2018 coming to PC, Cyberpunk and Witcher 3's Next Gen Release, and Grasshopper's Next 10 Years.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:03:30 - Housekeeping

A new episode of Gamescast is up and it features head of Xbox Game Studios Matt Booty

In case you missed it, the 2nd episode of The Arkham Files is already live over on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames and it’s all about why Batman: Arkham City is the best at making you truly feel like Batman. The next episode of The Arkham Files premieres this coming Monday, October 25th, and it’s all about why Batman: Arkham Origins was left behind and forgotten AND why it’s better than you remember.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
